Exaile is a music player that aims to be similar in style and function to KDE's <nowiki>[[Amarok]]</nowiki>, but uses the GTK+ widget toolkit rather than Qt. It is written in Python and utilizes the GStreamer media framework.

== Key Features ==
* Playlists
* Lyrics
* Download Covers
* Rating System
* Podcasts
* Equalizer

== Screenshot ==
<nowiki>[[File:Exaile.png|Exaile 0.3.1]]</nowiki>

== Installation ==
<pre>
sudo add-apt-repository ppa:exaile-devel/ppa
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install exaile
</pre>
You'll find further help on the official <nowiki>[[http://exaile.org/downloads|webpage]]</nowiki>

== Other music players ==
* '''<nowiki>[[Amarok]]</nowiki>''' - KDE's default music player
* '''<nowiki>[[Banshee]]</nowiki>''' - Music playing and managing for GNOME
* '''<nowiki>[[Rhythmbox]]</nowiki>''' - Ubuntu's default music player
